course.subject: ENVR
course.name: The Circular Economy â€“ Institutions, stakeholders and modes of implementation
course.description: This course provides an insight into the circular economy concept and its modes of implementation. While the central focus is laid on the CE development in China, comparisons with particular CE elements from other countries such as Germany, Japan and the European Union will be conducted. The main thematic content of this course are (1) institutional structures, (2) Eco-industrial park estates and (3) waste management.
